alfredsnippet.snippet:
Hey NAME,

I wanted to followup on my previous email about your interest in The Iron Yard. 

We are currently interviewing for our courses that begin on February 1, 2016, and classes are beginning to fill. I don't want you to miss you chance in securing a spot, so let's schedule a time to chat.

Grab a time on my calendar here: http://calendly.com/dorton/tiy_informational

If you're ready to dive in, please see our website page on our offerings for more details and links to apply to each course:

http://theironyard.com/apply/

Let's chat soon about next steps

Thanks,
alfredsnippet.name: 2nd Nutshell Followup
